cause.description:
Did you know...
*Statistics show that one in five children will grow up to develop skin cancer * Skin cancer is the fastest growing cancer * Melanoma is the #1 cancer killer of young women 25-29 years old * Skin cancer is 95% preventable * Melanoma is now the second leading cause of loss of productive work years due to cancer.
These are some of the facts you can read at http://www.shadefoundation.org
On a personal level, my father died from melanoma at the age of 49. I've tried my best to educate others around me but only a dedicated organization can raise awareness on a national level.
I believe the Shade Foundation (also known as the CURT AND SHONDA SCHILLING MELANOMA FOUNDATION OF AMERICA) is doing a phenomenal job getting the word out there through its programs and sponsored events.
Feel free to use The Wall to post your personal stories.
1. Skin cancer can be prevented
2. Melanoma is a deadly form of cancer
cause.mission: Dedicated to eradicating melanoma through the education of children and the community in the prevention and detection of skin cancer and the promotion of sun safety.
cause.name: Skin Cancer Awareness and Prevention
